title: Top Ways to Upgrade Your Airline Seat Without Elite Status Frugal Travel Guy

type_specific.selection: The best way to get that aisle seat in the exit row, economy plus’ three extra inches or that coveted first class upgrade is to have elite status with the airline you’re flying.
